activities: Data for benefits enrollment, compensation calculations and succession planning.  Employees are asked to provide personal data at hiring, and throughout their employment, to permit us to compensate them for their work, provide fringe benefits, and perform other tasks related to the operation of the company.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization data, including manually processed data.
